name: 583A-301 Definitions
text:
PART III.  ENFORCEMENT

 []  Definitions.  In this part:
	"Petitioner" means a person who seeks enforcement of an order for return of a child under the Hague Convention on the Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction, or enforcement of a child-custody determination.
	"Respondent" means a person against whom a proceeding has been commenced for enforcement of an order for return of a child under the Hague Convention on the Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction, or enforcement of a child-custody determination. [L 2002, c 124, pt of §2]
